alert.note: Alert for Central Marion; Western Marion (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 12 at 8:28AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...GUSTY SHOWERS WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN MARION COUNTY THROUGH 915 AM EDT... At 828 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking gusty showers capable of producing a landspout 8 miles south of Rainbow Lakes Estates, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and wind gusts around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ocala, Ocala Airport, Santos, and Dunnellon. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 AM EDT for northern Florida.
